ygData.msgSnippet: I know about the offer from alladvantage, It s hard to miss the constant barrage of advertisments about it. I d appreciate not seeing it here. Let this be an
ygData.rawEmail:
X-Digest-Num: 56
Message-ID: <17248.56.144.959279670@...>
Date: Sun, 7 Nov 1999 01:31:17 -0500
From: maxim@...)
Subject: Glad

I know about the offer from alladvantage, It's hard to miss the constant
barrage of advertisments about it. I'd appreciate not seeing it here. Let
this be an end to our disagreement. 

About Gladiator...
I was wondering what you guys used to program it, I am learning the basics
of C and C++ and would like to learn some more about graphical coding. Would
it be possible to see some of your source code (heh heh...not likely, eh?)
or at least maybe direct me to somewhere I could learn more...It seems that
all the graphic resources available online are way too advanced or only for
specific compilers such as Microsoft Visual C++ which I don't have the
pleasure of owning. (ahem) 

-Maxim
